volume_hl.desc: volume sold of the sku in hectoliters

gto.desc: gross turnover of the sku in local currency

promotional_discount.desc: discount given for promotion / promotion budget for the sku in local currency

other_discount.desc: other discounts / budget for the sku in local currency

total_discount.desc: sum of promotional and other discounts

excise.desc: excise taxes levied on the sales of the skus

net_revenue.desc: revenue earned after the deduction of costs (net revenue = gto - total_discount - excise)

maco.desc: marginal contribution of the sku (maco = net revenue - vilc)

vilc.desc: variable inventory and logistics cost of the sku

retail_sales_index.desc: a quarterly measure of the value of goods sold by retailers

unemployment_rate.desc: percentage of people in the labour force who are unemployed

cpi.desc: consumer price index; measure of the average change overtime in the prices paid by urban consumers for a market basket of consumer goods and services

private_consumption.desc: measure of all the money spent by consumers in the country to buy goods and services

gross_domestic_saving.desc: measure of savings of household sector, private corporate sector, and public sector

brad_money.desc: measures of amount of money circulating in an economy

gdp.desc: gross domestic product; monetary measure of the market value of all the final goods and services produced in a specific time-period by a country or countries

min_volume_variation.desc: minimum allowed change in volume compared to previous month

max_volume_variation.desc: maximum allowed change in volume compared to previous month
